short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Axeda Data Injector is a serial port tool used with Google Chrome to send formatted serial data to an Axeda Ready Device.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Axeda Data Injector is a serial based tool to send formatted data to supported Axeda Ready Devices. The V2.0 release supports a few different serial protocols, 3bar, Inventek AT Commands and AKP. By sending messages in one of these protocols, the Axeda Ready device will relay the data to a configured platform. For more information please visit http://developer.axeda.com
